text: what up outliers quick market update we're going to go through the markets r large talk about some upcoming news I want to talk about my Siggy loss because those are always fun for everybody I want to talk about crowd strike the rally that's going on there and then I want to take a look at uh GameStop and chewy both because I had a couple questions on each of those not going to lie couple minutes late today because your boy was watching a rugby highlight reel that completely captivated me for a while I love rugby so it was a super sick video but we're we're back in the office now we're ready to rock and roll so what's going on today well a few things realistically I think when I look at the market today there's kind of one big thing that I point out which is this right here retail sales month over month came in at 1 versus 0.4 versus the prior being at negative 0.2 what is this all mean well it means that this is like the largest expansion in this metric for like the last year and a half the reason why this matters is because it shows that the economy is still relatively resilient we're not seeing charge offs going through the roof we're not seeing delinquencies going too crazy so all of that in this case leads us to just essentially seeing that the market is holding up fairly
